thread.title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson teases new romance with this TOWIE star
thread.title_full: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson teases new romance with this TOWIE star

title: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson teases new romance with this TOWIE star
text:
Little Mix's Jesy Nelson teases new romance with this TOWIE star February 23, 2017 by Sharnaz Shahid Little Mix singer Jesy Nelson has fuelled rumours she is dating a TOWIE star, just three months after her split from former fianc√© Jake Roche Leave a comment 
It's been three months since Jesy Nelson announced the end of her engagement to Rixton lead singer Jake Roche . But it seems the Little Mix star has put her heartache to one side and moved on with TOWIE star Chris Clark , who escorted her to the Brit Awards on Wednesday night. Cuddling up together for a picture, Jesy appeared to be on cloud nine. "I don't want this girl to go back America tomorrow," the TV hunk cryptically wrote on Instagram. A post shared by Chris Clark (@chrisjclark_) on Feb 22, 2017 at 3:25pm PST 
BRIT Awards 2017: Complete winners list 
Rumours of a romance between the pair first emerged earlier this month after they started to follow each other on Instagram. Jesy had another reason to be happy on the night as Little Mix picked up the Best Single award for their chart-topping hit Shout Out To My Ex . Fellow bandmate Jade Thirlwall paid tribute to all their exes as they accepted the gong, telling the crowd: "Thank you so much. We honestly didn't think we were going to get it, we were just sat there chin-wagging. We'd like to thank our label Sony, Syco, Simon [Cowell], our amazing A&R, our management, and us girls, because if it wasn't for our friendship, we wouldn't still be going. And lastly cheers to our exes for helping us to do an amazing song, this one's for you lads."
